item.title: Flytipped kitchen sink, 22nd January
item.description:
There is a kitchen metal sink in the northern slope from the Honeybourne Line bridge that crosses over Market Street. What3Words location///corn.plots.galaxy

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honeybourne, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge Barriers, 22nd January
item.description:
We understand that a refurbishment scheme for the bridge structure is currently programmed for 2031/32. However, we believe this work should be brought forward due to concerns for the safety of pedestrians and other road users. The bridge railings are very low (approximately 90cm) and present a potential safety risk, particularly given that vehicles, including buses, pass over the bridge at speeds of up to 30mph. We would be happy to provide photographs to support these concerns if required. Hucclecote Parish Council
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
